trends: There have been 9 other sightings in North Babylon
There was one other sighting in North Babylon on or around June 23rd 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsThis was by far the best event I have witnessed, the same light same object came over and slowed down at one point as if it was putting on a show for me. Last night was stormy and you couldn't see anything sure enough tonight is crystal clear and it came back and was it's best showing yet.I was completely overwhemled with happiness when it slowed down the way it did and just stuck around these events are becoming so addicting its unreal.
